modShortDescription: With this 7 Days to Die mod, resource stones are giving iron, potassium, lead, coal and stone, and terrestrial stone is also giving some iron.
modDescription:
A18 is unforgiving. [Mining](https://7daystodiemods.com/mining-mods/) doesn’t really make fun anymore, especially because veins are rare to find without the corresponding resourceblocks above. Claymore decided to simply port over the harvests from A17 to 18\. With this 7 Days to Die mod, resource stones are giving iron, potassium, lead, coal and stone, and terrestrial stone is also giving some iron. Like he said: Same like A17.

Compatibility: A18+

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/pnpqjkd53802976/Claymore_Return_of_Resources.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
